text: Futhi khumbula ngenkathi uMose ethi kubantu bakhe, “Oh Bantu bami! Kungani ningihlupha kulapho senazi ukuthi mina ngiyisithunywa sikaMvelinqangi kunina” ngakho-ke kwathi lapho sebephambuka, waziphambukisa uMvelinqangi izinhliziyo zabo futhi uMvelinqangi akabaholi abantu abephula umthetho (abayizoni)
